    Alkaline Water Kills Cancer – This Is How To Prepare It !?

    • http://blogs.naturalnews.com/alkaline-water-kills-cancer-prepare/
    • Tweet
    • Pin It

    By Prof. Hesin

    Posted Thursday, January 21, 2016 at 02:55pm EDT

    Keywords: alkaline water, calcium, cancer, detox, fluoride, health, heart disease, immune system, Natural remedies, Toxins

    What is Alkaline Water?

    The pH, or potential hydrogen, scale runs from zero to fourteen, with 7 as the neutral middle. An acid is a substance with a pH of less than 7. A basic or alkaline substance has a pH of greater than 7.

    Your Tap water is generally a mixture of chlorine, anti-biotics, hormones and other metals that will go straight into your system.

    Impure water can cause a weakened immune system and an array of other illnesses that occur when the immune system is vulnerable.

    Many time our bodies become too acidic, we feel low energy, fatigue, digestive issues, weight gain and other side effects that are completely avoidable just by drinking pure water and eating fresh organic vegetables with a healthy acid/alkaline balance.

    Importance of Alkalinity

    We have known from century that food can determine our overall pH levels. Dr. Otto Warburg of Germany 1931 Nobel Prize winner discovering that up to 95% of all cancers have acidic environment as the cause behind them. He also showed that cancers cannot thrive in an alkaline environment where the pH level is 7.36 or more.

    He claimed almost a century ago that acidosis (excess acidity) is not only connected to development of cancer, it could also cause other diseases like osteoporosis, diabetes, heart disease and almost all other chronic diseases which we suffer from nowadays.

    5 min Recipe: Detoxifying Lemon Water Recipe

    Ingredients:

    1 lemon
    1/2 cucumber
    1/4 ginger root
    1/2 cup mint leaves

    Direction:

    -Peel a small amount of ginger before you cut it.
    -Slice up all the ingredients and add it water.
    -If you want to get the most out of the ingredients, do not throw them out after one use.
    -Generally, they will last around three days if you keep adding new water.
    -Drink first thing in the morning for optimum results.

    How It Works?

    Lemon is well known for its pH balancing properties. Although it has quite an acidic taste, it is inherently alkaline and helps the body maintain its balance. It is a powerful disinfectant and antibacterial compound, aiding in the treatment many conditions from bad breath to cholera, and has 22 anti-cancer properties.

    Sources:

    http://livingtraditionally.com/alkaline-water-kills-cancer-this-is-how-to-prepare-it/

    http://www.youngandraw.com/how-to-make-your-own-alkaline-water-at-home-2/

    http://www.takepart.com/article/2013/09/25/alkaline-water-not-fountain-youth

    • Designer Genes

      Citric ACID is alkaline? Wtf?…

      • Master Max

        Yes. Is alkaline but in human body, while u are absorb and digest it’s morphing(changing) from acid to alkaline in to your cells and tissue.
        Other thing u gota birthday cake with PH 7.5 usually but once u digest , is highly acidic. Some things are alkaline like cucumber ph ~8.5 and after absorbtion is even better. I mean I guess i am right

      • De Rizz

        http://www.alkalizeforhealth.net/index.htm

      • Susan C. Wheeler

        Try it and find out for yourself. You can buy ph test strips

    • Prateek Lala

      Kindly explain:
      1. How lemons, which have a pH of about 2-3, can make water alkaline.
      2. Why you seem to have no concept of physiological buffer systems.
      3. Why nothing claimed on this blog ever references published scientific evidence.
      Cheers.

      • JacobLaw

        Always the academic qualification argument; most people now know that the so called publish scientific evidence is bogus and these type of blogs have much more creditability, sad but it’s true.

        • Designer Genes

          How does one judge if evidence and information is bogus or not?

          • Chris T

            Trying this yourself is how.

        • Prateek Lala

          Any equally ridiculous responses to the other two points?

          • Counter View

            Your so called science publication is nothing but politicized piece of shit promoted and endorced for the interest of Big pharma cartels and we dont need your distorted publication as a point of reference.Man has always survived based on ancient knowledge and the provision of nature before your fake scientific publication came into existence.

            Where was your science publication when the ancient egyptians built the pyramid and treated(Cured)countless diseases and ailments?
            Talking about science as if,its some shit that started in your backyard.

            Another Big pharma agent.

            • Prateek Lala

              I notice that your petulant tirade doesn’t actually address any of the questions asked. Want to try again?

            • rdlynn

              No contrary opinions or questioning of the consensus permitted. Just remember CO2 causes global warming and solar activity has nothing to do with it and you will be accepted in polite society.

          • Chris T

            I’d say you give it a try.

        • Counter View

          Seconded.You are on point Jacoblaw.

      • Susan C. Wheeler

        How about trying it and testing it with strips. That’ll answer it once and for all

    • Rossi Khan

      This is quite simple actually. A lemon’s alkaline mineral content exceeds its citric acid content. This is why it has an overall alkaline effect.

      • Designer Genes

        Ah! Okay. Thanks for the clarification! Oh wait, but what about that experiment we did in junior high where we tested lemon juice with pH paper and it turned red as an acid would?? I’m confused again. 🙁

        • ALLISON BECK

          Ah, but that is still OUTSIDE the body… hence no morphing (digesting) effect. Just my opinion. And I’ve read about lemon having an alkaline effect on the body in many places besides this blog; I do my research.

          • Designer Genes

            So it’s like I’m building up my body’s tolerance to acids?

            • smarterthanyou

              you got it Einstein

    • Politically Incorrect

      This seems easy enough to validate, as one can buy a PH tester on Amazon for $15-20…

    • Xny

      How long would it remain fresh?

    • Dusty Green

      To answer your questions … you might wanna’ read this http://smartbodyz.com/Alkaline-Body-pH-Baking-Soda-Heartburn.htm

Natural News is not spam.

      Sincerely,
      “Fog” Ray Feldman
